translation.home-intro-description: Instagram profile public data and to track profile posts' and stories' metadata in order to filter them by hashtags and mentions.
translation.home-services-service-1: Find bloggers and influencers who will reach your target audience.
translation.home-services-service-2: Find out which bloggers will yield results and who will not bring sales or subscribers.
translation.home-services-service-3: Don’t waste your budget on inflated blogger accounts with fake followers.
translation.home-services-service-4: Analyse the quality and growth of instagram followers
translation.home-demonstration-1-desc: Upload the list of accounts using the administrative panel or via the corresponding API method.
translation.home-demonstration-2-desc: Track profile posts' and stories' metadata in order to filter them by hashtags and mentions.
translation.home-demonstration-3-desc: Obtain cached media in the dashboard or via API.
translation.home-tariff-plan-desc: Flexible Billing System. Individual approach to clients. We are ready to work with clients' tasks and adapt our services to them.
translation.home-pluses-1: A unique service on the market for downloading and caching stories, including all media content.
translation.home-pluses-3: Individual approach to clients. We are ready to work with clients' tasks and adapt our services to them.
translation.modal-success-desc-1: Thank you for interesting our company.
translation.modal-success-desc-2: Our manager will contact you soon!

translation.prices-desc: Hypelitix was created by a developer team mainly working on social networks promotion and analytics. It's a paid web-service which provides publicly available Instagram profiles data in an automated andgeneralized way making it easier to analyze data for it's clients. Specifically.
translation.prices-warning: Individual price offers for orders over 50,000 accounts
